summary: Frontend testing completed for GRC Platform (Reflex framework). All 10 pages tested successfully - Dashboard, Control Testing, Issues, KRIs, KCIs, Risk Heatmap, Frameworks, Controls, Policies, and Risks. All navigation links work correctly. All forms (Record Test, Report Issue, Add KRI, Add KCI) open and display properly with correct fields.
critical_code_review_comments: The grc_platform.py file is quite large (~1800+ lines). Consider splitting into separate page modules for better maintainability.
seed_data_creation: Mock data already seeded via seed_data.py - 5 frameworks, 7 unified controls, 5 policies, 6 control tests, 4 issues, 4 risks, 5 KRIs, 5 KCIs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All pages are working correctly. The GRC Platform is built with Reflex (Python web framework). Navigation is via sidebar. Data is loaded from MongoDB via on_load events. Forms toggle visibility via state variables. The app uses MOCK data from local MongoDB.

features_verified: Risk Matrix (5x5 grid) with color coding
Risk Relationship Network showing Risks -> KRIs -> KCIs flow

mocked_api_note: All data is MOCKED from local MongoDB seeded with sample GRC data. No real external API integrations are active.
rca_of_the_issue: N/A - No issues found during testing
